subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Keegan Bradley, whose aunt is a former L.P.G.A. star and World Golf Hall of Fame member, has acclimated to life on the PGA Tour at a dizzying pace.
snippet: Keegan Bradley, whose aunt is a former L.P.G.A. star and World Golf Hall of Fame member, has acclimated to life on the PGA Tour at a dizzying pace.
